TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbCommandBuilder extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public MustInherit Class DbCommandBuilder Inherits Component
public ref class DbCommandBuilder abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调 的更改与关联数据库的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 这是一个只能被继承的抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class that can only be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> class is provided for the convenience of provider writers creating their own command builders. By inheriting from this class, developers can implement provider specific behavior in their own code. The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source. 但是，如果设置了的属性，则可以创建一个 对象来自动为单表更新生成 SQL 语句 。However, you can create a object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后，将生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句 。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 只要设置属性，就会将自身注册为事件侦听器 。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 一次只能将一个 或 对象彼此关联。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，请 使用 属性来自动检索所需的元数据集。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果在 检索元数据后更改， (例如，在第一次更新) 后，应调用 方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata has been retrieved (for example, after the first update), you should call the method to update the metadata. `SelectCommand` 还必须至少返回一个主键或唯一列。The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column. 如果不存在， 则会生成异常，并且不生成命令。If none exist, an exception is generated, and the commands are not generated. 还使用引用的 、 和 属性 。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 如果修改了这些属性中的任何一个，则用户应调用，或者是否 替换本身。The user should call if any of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则 ，、 和 属性将保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用 ，将 从解除关联 ，并且不再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method allows an implementation of the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph> class to handle provider-specific parameter properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置自动为其生成 Transact-SQL 语句的一个 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object for which Transact-SQL statements are automatically generated.
A object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph> registers itself as a listener for <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating></ph> events that are generated by the <ph id="ph3"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph> specified in this property.
When you create a new instance of <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph>, any existing <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph> associated with this <ph id="ph3"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph> is released.

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called by the public <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method and the `Finalize` method. <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed. You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command. For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the associated command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>. 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 如果的重载版本 允许您通过提供布尔值来指定此行为，则可以 通过传递来使生成基于列名称的参数 `True` 。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior by supplying a Boolean value, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead by passing `True`.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed. You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command. For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>. 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为参数传递，可以 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行插入操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform insertions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed. You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command. For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>. 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 如果的重载版本 允许您指定此行为，则可以使 根据列名生成参数。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行更新操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform updates at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed. You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command. For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>. 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 如果的重载版本 允许您指定此行为，则可以使 根据列名生成参数。If the overloaded version of allows you to specify this behavior, you can cause the to generate parameters based on the column names instead.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

span.span: Generating Commands with CommandBuilders
ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed. You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command. For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>. 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序 以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用或时，将首次生成 SQL 语句 。The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是对 `@p1` 各种参数使用、 `@p2` 等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 通过 `true` 为参数传递，可以 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 强制根据 列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，基于列名生成参数才会成功：Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足正则表达式中指定的条件 。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定了。A is specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string QuotePrefix { get; set; }
.property instance string QuotePrefix
Public Overridable Property QuotePrefix As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QuotePrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QuotePrefix : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指定其名称包含空格或保留标记等字符的数据库对象（例如，表或列）时使用的开始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The beginning character or characters to use.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons. To accommodate this capability, use the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A></ph> and <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A></ph> properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
> [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A></ph> or <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A></ph> properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the <ph id="ph3">`Update`</ph> method of a <ph id="ph4"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph>.

exception.span: 当生成 Insert、Update 或 Delete 命令后，不能更改此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

span.span: Generating Commands with CommandBuilders
ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format:
## Remarks Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons. To accommodate this capability, use the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A></ph> and <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A></ph> properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
> [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A></ph> or <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A></ph> properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the <ph id="ph3">`Update`</ph> method of a <ph id="ph4"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph>.

.property instance string SchemaSeparator
Public Overridable Property SchemaSeparator As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SchemaSeparator { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SchemaSeparator : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要用作架构标识符和任何其他标识符之间的分隔符的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.

value.span: 要用作架构分隔符的字符。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Generally, database servers indicate the schema for an identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as <bpt id="p1">**</bpt>Person:CustomerName<ept id="p1">**</ept>, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

span.span: Generating Commands with CommandBuilders

member this.SetAllValues : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 update 语句中是包含所有列值还是仅包含更改的列值。

span.span: Specifies whether all column values in an update statement are included or only changed ones.

value.span: 如果 生成的 UPDATE 语句包含所有列，则为 ；如果它仅包含更改的列，则为 。

span.span: if the UPDATE statement generated by the includes all columns; if it includes only changed columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The UPDATE statement generated by a <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph> can include update information about all the columns, or it can include information only about those columns whose values have changed. Setting the <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.SetAllValues%2A></ph> property to <ph id="ph2">`true`</ph> causes the generated UPDATE statement to include all the columns, whether their values have changed or not.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令

param.name: adapter
param.span: 要用于更新的 。

span.span: The to be used for the update.

summary.span: 注册 以处理 的 事件。

span.span: Registers the to handle the event for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder. When a new <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph> is added to the <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph>, it is registered for the DbDataAdapter's <bpt id="p1">**</bpt>RowUpdating<ept id="p1">**</ept> event. If this method is called again with the same <ph id="ph1"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter></ph>, the <ph id="ph2"><xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder></ph> is unregistered for that DbDataAdapter's <bpt id="p1">**</bpt>RowUpdating<ept id="p1">**</ept> event.

related.span: 使用 CommandBuilder 生成命令
